wiki.summary: On “Dusk Till Dawn,” ZAYN and Sia tell the story of two lovers who are willing to do whatever it takes to stay together. The song was released alongside its cinematic music video, wherein ZAYN portrays a secret agent, running from the law and accompanied by a mysterious female portrayed by British actress Jemima Kirke. Read more on Last.fm.
